phase_1a_status.notes: Building base structure with cutouts. Iteration 003 had critical issues - missing windows/doors. Phase 1A focuses on base geometry + cutouts only.

phase_1b_status.notes: Awaiting Phase 1A approval. Will add window frames, glass, door panels to cutouts.

phase_2_status.notes: Awaiting Phase 1A and 1B approval. Will add realistic materials to frozen geometry.

phase_3_status.notes: Awaiting all prior phase approvals. Will add environment and scene context.
